adHeader: Foreign Language Small Group / Private Instruction / Immersion
adDetails: TRADUX Foreign Language Academy helps you learn a new language: French, Spanish, Russian. Our professional, native speaker instructors get you talking, conversing and exploring the culture of the language. You'll learn the vocabulary and the grammar you need for communicating in a new language. We prepare you for travel, business, self improvement. Our groups are small to engage you and provide you maximum attention. Group classes at all levels start monthly. Private instruction is personalized to your goals. You can explore the culture, literature and history of your new language or learn professional and technical language to enhance your skills.
